018package com.scivicslab.actoriac;
019
020import java.io.File;
021import java.io.FileInputStream;
022import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.io.InputStream;
025import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
026import java.util.logging.Level;
027import java.util.logging.Logger;
028
029import org.json.JSONArray;
030import org.json.JSONObject;
031
032import com.github.lalyos.jfiglet.FigletFont;
033import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
034import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
035import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
036
037/**
038 * Interpreter-interfaced actor reference for {@link NodeInterpreter} instances.
039 *
040 * <p>This class provides a concrete implementation of {@link IIActorRef}
041 * specifically for {@link NodeInterpreter} objects. It handles action invocations
042 * by name, supporting both workflow execution actions (inherited from Interpreter)
043 * and infrastructure actions (SSH command execution).</p>
044 *
045 * <p>Supported actions include:</p>
046 * <ul>
047 * <li><strong>Workflow actions (from Interpreter):</strong></li>
048 *   <ul>
049 *   <li>{@code execCode} - Executes the loaded workflow code</li>
050 *   <li>{@code readYaml} - Reads a YAML workflow definition from a file path</li>
051 *   <li>{@code readJson} - Reads a JSON workflow definition from a file path</li>
052 *   <li>{@code readXml} - Reads an XML workflow definition from a file path</li>
053 *   <li>{@code reset} - Resets the interpreter state</li>
054 *   </ul>
055 * <li><strong>Infrastructure actions (Node-specific):</strong></li>
056 *   <ul>
057 *   <li>{@code executeCommand} - Executes a command and reports to accumulator (default)</li>
058 *   <li>{@code executeCommandQuiet} - Executes a command without reporting</li>
059 *   <li>{@code executeSudoCommand} - Executes sudo command and reports to accumulator (default)</li>
060 *   <li>{@code executeSudoCommandQuiet} - Executes sudo command without reporting</li>
061 *   </ul>
062 * </ul>
063 *
064 * <h3>Example YAML Workflow:</h3>
065 * <pre>{@code
066 * name: deploy-application
067 * steps:
068 *   - states: ["0", "1"]
069 *     actions:
070 *       - actor: this
071 *         method: executeCommand
072 *         arguments:
073 *           - "apt-get update"
074 *   - states: ["1", "end"]
075 *     actions:
076 *       - actor: this
077 *         method: executeCommand
078 *         arguments:
079 *           - "ls -la"
080 * }</pre>
081 *
082 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
083 */
084public class NodeIIAR extends IIActorRef<NodeInterpreter> {
085
086    Logger logger = null;
087
088    /**
089     * Constructs a new NodeIIAR with the specified actor name and node interpreter object.
090     *
091     * @param actorName the name of this actor
092     * @param object the {@link NodeInterpreter} instance managed by this actor reference
093     */
094    public NodeIIAR(String actorName, NodeInterpreter object) {
095        super(actorName, object);
096        logger = Logger.getLogger(actorName);
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Constructs a new NodeIIAR with the specified actor name, node interpreter object,
101     * and actor system.
102     *
103     * @param actorName the name of this actor
104     * @param object the {@link NodeInterpreter} instance managed by this actor reference
105     * @param system the actor system managing this actor
106     */
107    public NodeIIAR(String actorName, NodeInterpreter object, IIActorSystem system) {
108        super(actorName, object, system);
109        logger = Logger.getLogger(actorName);
110
111        // Set the selfActorRef in the Interpreter (NodeInterpreter extends Interpreter)
112        object.setSelfActorRef(this);
113    }
114
115    /**
116     * Invokes an action on the node by name with the given arguments.
117     *
118     * <p>This method dispatches to specialized handler methods based on the action type:</p>
119     * <ul>
120     *   <li>Workflow actions: {@link #handleWorkflowAction}</li>
121     *   <li>Command execution actions: {@link #handleCommandAction}</li>
122     *   <li>Utility actions: {@link #handleUtilityAction}</li>
123     * </ul>
124     *
125     * @param actionName the name of the action to execute
126     * @param arg the argument string (file path for read operations, JSON array for commands)
127     * @return an {@link ActionResult} indicating success or failure with a message
128     */
129    @Override
130    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String arg) {
131        logger.fine(String.format("actionName = %s, args = %s", actionName, arg));
132
133        try {
134            // Workflow execution actions (from Interpreter)
135            ActionResult workflowResult = handleWorkflowAction(actionName, arg);
136            if (workflowResult != null) {
137                return workflowResult;
138            }
139
140            // Node-specific actions (SSH command execution)
141            ActionResult commandResult = handleCommandAction(actionName, arg);
142            if (commandResult != null) {
143                return commandResult;
144            }
145
146            // Utility actions
147            ActionResult utilityResult = handleUtilityAction(actionName, arg);
148            if (utilityResult != null) {
149                return utilityResult;
150            }
151
152            // Unknown action
153            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("Unknown action: actorName = %s, action = %s, arg = %s",
154                    this.getName(), actionName, arg));
155            return new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
156
157        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
158            String message = "Interrupted: " + e.getMessage();
159            logger.warning(String.format("%s: %s", this.getName(), message));
160            return new ActionResult(false, message);
161        } catch (ExecutionException e) {
162            String message = extractRootCauseMessage(e);
163            logger.warning(String.format("%s: %s", this.getName(), message));
164            return new ActionResult(false, message);
165        }
166    }
167
168    /**
169     * Handles workflow-related actions (from Interpreter).
170     *
171     * @param actionName the action name
172     * @param arg the argument string
173     * @return ActionResult if handled, null if not a workflow action
174     */
175    private ActionResult handleWorkflowAction(String actionName, String arg)
176            throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
177
178        switch (actionName) {
179            case "execCode":
180                return this.ask(n -> n.execCode()).get();
181
182            case "readYaml":
183                return handleReadYaml(arg);
184
185            case "readJson":
186                return handleReadJson(arg);
187
188            case "readXml":
189                return handleReadXml(arg);
190
191            case "reset":
192                this.tell(n -> n.reset()).get();
193                return new ActionResult(true, "Interpreter reset successfully");
194
195            case "runUntilEnd":
196                int maxIterations = parseMaxIterations(arg, 10000);
197                return this.ask(n -> n.runUntilEnd(maxIterations)).get();
198
199            case "call":
200                JSONArray callArgs = new JSONArray(arg);
201                String callWorkflowFile = callArgs.getString(0);
202                return this.ask(n -> n.call(callWorkflowFile)).get();
203
204            case "runWorkflow":
205                JSONArray runArgs = new JSONArray(arg);
206                String runWorkflowFile = runArgs.getString(0);
207                int runMaxIterations = runArgs.length() > 1 ? runArgs.getInt(1) : 10000;
208                logger.fine(String.format("Running workflow: %s (maxIterations=%d)", runWorkflowFile, runMaxIterations));
209                ActionResult result = this.object.runWorkflow(runWorkflowFile, runMaxIterations);
210                logger.fine(String.format("Workflow completed: success=%s, result=%s", result.isSuccess(), result.getResult()));
211                return result;
212
213            case "apply":
214                return this.ask(n -> n.apply(arg)).get();
215
216            default:
217                return null; // Not a workflow action
218        }
219    }
220
221    /**
222     * Handles SSH command execution actions.
223     *
224     * @param actionName the action name
225     * @param arg the argument string
226     * @return ActionResult if handled, null if not a command action
227     */
228    private ActionResult handleCommandAction(String actionName, String arg)
229            throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
230
231        switch (actionName) {
232            case "executeCommandQuiet":
233                return executeCommandQuiet(arg);
234
235            case "executeSudoCommandQuiet":
236                return executeSudoCommandQuiet(arg);
237
238            case "executeCommand":
239                return executeCommandWithReport(arg);
240
241            case "executeSudoCommand":
242                return executeSudoCommandWithReport(arg);
243
244            default:
245                return null; // Not a command action
246        }
247    }
248
249    /**
250     * Handles utility actions (sleep, print, doNothing).
251     *
252     * @param actionName the action name
253     * @param arg the argument string
254     * @return ActionResult if handled, null if not a utility action
255     */
256    private ActionResult handleUtilityAction(String actionName, String arg) {
257        switch (actionName) {
258            case "sleep":
259                try {
260                    long millis = Long.parseLong(arg);
261                    Thread.sleep(millis);
262                    return new ActionResult(true, "Slept for " + millis + "ms");
263                } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
264                    logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("Invalid sleep duration: %s", arg), e);
265                    return new ActionResult(false, "Invalid sleep duration: " + arg);
266                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
267                    return new ActionResult(false, "Sleep interrupted: " + e.getMessage());
268                }
269
270            case "print":
271                System.out.println(arg);
272                return new ActionResult(true, "Printed: " + arg);
273
274            case "doNothing":
275                return new ActionResult(true, arg);
276
277            default:
278                return null; // Not a utility action
279        }
280    }
281
282    // --- Helper methods for workflow actions ---
283
284    private ActionResult handleReadYaml(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
285        try {
286            String overlayPath = this.object.getOverlayDir();
287            if (overlayPath != null) {
288                java.nio.file.Path yamlPath = java.nio.file.Path.of(arg);
289                java.nio.file.Path overlayDir = java.nio.file.Path.of(overlayPath);
290                this.tell(n -> {
291                    try {
292                        n.readYaml(yamlPath, overlayDir);
293                    } catch (IOException e) {
294                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
295                    }
296                }).get();
297                return new ActionResult(true, "YAML loaded with overlay: " + overlayPath);
298            } else {
299                try (InputStream input = new FileInputStream(new File(arg))) {
300                    this.tell(n -> n.readYaml(input)).get();
301                    return new ActionResult(true, "YAML loaded successfully");
302                }
303            }
304        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
305            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("file not found: %s", arg), e);
306            return new ActionResult(false, "File not found: " + arg);
307        } catch (IOException e) {
308            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("IOException: %s", arg), e);
309            return new ActionResult(false, "IO error: " + arg);
310        } catch (RuntimeException e) {
311            if (e.getCause() instanceof IOException) {
312                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("IOException: %s", arg), e.getCause());
313                return new ActionResult(false, "IO error: " + arg);
314            }
315            throw e;
316        }
317    }
318
319    private ActionResult handleReadJson(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
320        try (InputStream input = new FileInputStream(new File(arg))) {
321            this.tell(n -> {
322                try {
323                    n.readJson(input);
324                } catch (IOException e) {
325                    throw new RuntimeException(e);
326                }
327            }).get();
328            return new ActionResult(true, "JSON loaded successfully");
329        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
330            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("file not found: %s", arg), e);
331            return new ActionResult(false, "File not found: " + arg);
332        } catch (IOException e) {
333            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("IOException: %s", arg), e);
334            return new ActionResult(false, "IO error: " + arg);
335        }
336    }
337
338    private ActionResult handleReadXml(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
339        try (InputStream input = new FileInputStream(new File(arg))) {
340            this.tell(n -> {
341                try {
342                    n.readXml(input);
343                } catch (Exception e) {
344                    throw new RuntimeException(e);
345                }
346            }).get();
347            return new ActionResult(true, "XML loaded successfully");
348        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
349            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("file not found: %s", arg), e);
350            return new ActionResult(false, "File not found: " + arg);
351        } catch (Exception e) {
352            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("Exception: %s", arg), e);
353            return new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + arg);
354        }
355    }
356
357    private int parseMaxIterations(String arg, int defaultValue) {
358        if (arg != null && !arg.isEmpty() && !arg.equals("[]")) {
359            try {
360                JSONArray args = new JSONArray(arg);
361                if (args.length() > 0) {
362                    return args.getInt(0);
363                }
364            } catch (Exception e) {
365                // Use default if parsing fails
366            }
367        }
368        return defaultValue;
369    }
370
371    // --- Helper methods for command actions ---
372
373    private ActionResult executeCommandQuiet(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
374        String command = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
375        Node.CommandResult result = this.ask(n -> {
376            try {
377                return n.executeCommand(command);
378            } catch (IOException e) {
379                throw new RuntimeException(e);
380            }
381        }).get();
382
383        return new ActionResult(result.isSuccess(),
384            String.format("exitCode=%d, stdout='%s', stderr='%s'",
385                result.getExitCode(), result.getStdout(), result.getStderr()));
386    }
387
388    private ActionResult executeSudoCommandQuiet(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
389        String command = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
390        Node.CommandResult result = this.ask(n -> {
391            try {
392                return n.executeSudoCommand(command);
393            } catch (IOException e) {
394                throw new RuntimeException(e);
395            }
396        }).get();
397
398        return new ActionResult(result.isSuccess(),
399            String.format("exitCode=%d, stdout='%s', stderr='%s'",
400                result.getExitCode(), result.getStdout(), result.getStderr()));
401    }
402
403    private ActionResult executeCommandWithReport(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
404        String command = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
405        Node.CommandResult result = this.ask(n -> {
406            try {
407                return n.executeCommand(command);
408            } catch (IOException e) {
409                throw new RuntimeException(e);
410            }
411        }).get();
412
413        reportToAccumulator(result);
414        return new ActionResult(result.isSuccess(), combineOutput(result));
415    }
416
417    private ActionResult executeSudoCommandWithReport(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
418        String command = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
419        Node.CommandResult result = this.ask(n -> {
420            try {
421                return n.executeSudoCommand(command);
422            } catch (IOException e) {
423                throw new RuntimeException(e);
424            }
425        }).get();
426
427        reportToAccumulator(result);
428        return new ActionResult(result.isSuccess(), combineOutput(result));
429    }
430
431    /**
432     * Reports command result to the accumulator actor if available.
433     */
434    private void reportToAccumulator(Node.CommandResult result) {
435        IIActorSystem sys = (IIActorSystem) this.system();
436        IIActorRef<?> accumulator = sys.getIIActor("accumulator");
437        if (accumulator != null) {
438            JSONObject reportArg = new JSONObject();
439            reportArg.put("source", this.getName());
440            reportArg.put("type", this.object.getCurrentVertexYaml());
441            reportArg.put("data", combineOutput(result));
442            accumulator.callByActionName("add", reportArg.toString());
443        }
444    }
445
446    /**
447     * Combines stdout and stderr into a single output string.
448     */
449    private String combineOutput(Node.CommandResult result) {
450        String output = result.getStdout().trim();
451        String stderr = result.getStderr().trim();
452        if (!stderr.isEmpty()) {
453            output = output.isEmpty() ? stderr : output + "\n[stderr]\n" + stderr;
454        }
455        return output;
456    }
457
458    /**
459     * Extracts the root cause message from an ExecutionException.
460     */
461    private String extractRootCauseMessage(ExecutionException e) {
462        Throwable cause = e.getCause();
463        while (cause != null && cause.getCause() != null) {
464            cause = cause.getCause();
465        }
466        return cause != null ? cause.getMessage() : e.getMessage();
467    }
468
469    /**
470     * Extracts a command string from JSON array arguments.
471     *
472     * <p>Expects arguments in the format: {@code ["command string"]}</p>
473     *
474     * @param arg the JSON array argument string
475     * @return the extracted command string
476     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the argument format is invalid
477     */
478    private String extractCommandFromArgs(String arg) {
479        try {
480            JSONArray jsonArray = new JSONArray(arg);
481            if (jsonArray.length() == 0) {
482                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Command arguments cannot be empty");
483            }
484            return jsonArray.getString(0);
485        } catch (Exception e) {
486            throw new IllegalArgumentException(
487                "Invalid command argument format. Expected JSON array with command string: " + arg, e);
488        }
489    }
490
491}
